Using the Dashboard¶

Start the App¶

  1. Within the activated virtual environment:

(venv) $ python3 app.py

  1. Open your web browser and go to: https://127.0.0.1:8050

Terminate the App¶

  1. In your Terminal, press CTRL + c.

  2. Exit the virtual environment by typing deactivate.
